data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Pingliang to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Pingliang, Gansu, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Pingliang. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 8,208 believers in Pingliang, Gansu, China desire the Bible as newborn babies desire milk.
data.verse: Desire God’s pure word as newborn babies desire milk. Then you will grow in your salvation.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Pingliang, Gansu, China, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Sogwo Arig people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, help 21 new simple churches start among the 108,200 people in the county of Pingliang, Gansu, China. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Pingliang, Gansu, China to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.section_summary:
the county of Pingliang, Gansu, China has a population of 108,200.

We estimate Pingliang has 8,208 people who might know Jesus, 1,748 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 98,244 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Pingliang, Gansu, China.
